      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Start the animation thread

      • initMedia

        public void initMedia()
        This method is initialised in the Main class and contains String variables with paths to the music/sound effects.
        It initialises Media class that represents a media source and MediaPlayer classes that controls and displays media playback.
